Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems at Forest Park. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier signal problems at Forest Park.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
